node.title: Energy company forecasts 'potential' for offshore wind farm capable of powering smelter
node.alt: A map of the area under investigation
node.description: The Alcoa Aluminium Smelter in Portland is one of the Victoria's biggest electricity users. One of the companies that supplies its power wants to turn it green.
node.content:
["A major Australian energy company has floated the prospect of building an offshore wind farm that could completely power one Victoria's biggest power users.\u00a0", "Alinta Energy released plans to investigate what it said was\u00a0the \"potential\" for a 1,000 megawatt\u00a0wind farm to be built in waters outside Portland, in south-west Victoria, which could be connected to the Alcoa Aluminium Smelter.", "If constructed, the estimated $4 billion wind farm would make the\u00a0smelter one of the first in Australia to be powered by up to 100 per cent renewable energy.\u00a0", "The smelter is one of Victoria's biggest power users, and is believed to consume about 10 per cent of the state's electricity.", "The mooted wind farm, known as the Spinifex Offshore Wind Farm,\u00a0comes days after the federal government introduced a framework to regulate the offshore renewable energy projects last week.\u00a0", "At 1,000 MW, the proposed Spinifex Wind Farm would be\u00a0smaller than the 2.2 gigawatt\u00a0Star of the Sea offshore wind farm mooted in Gippsland, which\u00a0received funding from the state government.", "
Potential not promise\u00a0\u00a0
", "The idea of constructing the offshore wind farm was released by Alinta Energy in an attempt to be as transparent as possible, according to the company.\u00a0", "Project specifics, including where turbines will go or how large they will be, are\u00a0yet to be determined.\u00a0", "Alinta Energy head of project development, Kris Lynch, said the company wants to speak as opening as possible about the investigation process.\u00a0", "\"The great thing about this proposal is that we can connect to the grid via the smelter and won\u2019t need to build new powerlines on private land,\" Mr Lynch said.", "", "
If the project goes ahead it could completely power the Alcoa Aluminium Smelter.(Supplied: Alcoa)
", "The site is outside of Commonwealth and state government protected waters.", "Alinta Energy said the timeline between now and reaching construction was between five and 10 years.\u00a0", "\"We think that there's going to be opportunities for local suppliers, local companies, as well as individuals to come and join us on the project,\" Mr Lynch said.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"I think there is always an element of risk at these early stages of the development and we are having some conversations at the state and Commonwealth level about support for the project.\"", "The manager of the Portland smelter, Ron Jorgensen,\u00a0has given\u00a0the idea the tick of approval.", "In\u00a0December, the future of the smelter was secured thanks for a federal government bank guarantee.\u00a0\u00a0", "Mr Jorgensen said the proposal had\u00a0potential to further improve the long-term viability of the smelter.\u00a0", "\"This proposal offers an ability to make a step change impact to Portland Aluminium\u2019s carbon footprint,\" Mr Jorgensen said.\u00a0", "", "
Portland Aluminium Smelter Manager Ron Jorgensen said the\u00a0proposal aligned with the aluminium industry\u2019s direction to decarbonise.(ABC South West Victoria: Emily Bissland)
", "Alinta Energy has\u00a0yet to make a funding commitment to project, with site investigations and environmental studies yet to be completed.\u00a0", "The company said wind monitoring, consultation and site surveys would commence next year."]
